title: plz do as i ask
body: riot plz  send me my new password and user  name. or i will hack my account back if you need help knowing its me ask my family they know my account name

replies.body:
You can actually request both of these on your own using the links below. No Hacking necessary:
>* [**Username Recovery**](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/forgot-username)
* [**Password Recovery**](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/forgot-password)

Let me know if you have any other questions. ^.^
